hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sa`id Al-Khudri:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Who ever sees me (in a dream) then he indeed has seen the truth, as Satan cannot appear in my shape

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ رَأَى النَّبِيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الْمَنَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever saw the Prophet (ﷺ) in a dream
